title: BITS Pilani Recruitment 2025 - Apply for 02 Project Technical Support and Other Post
description: Birla Institute of Technology and Science (BITS) Pilani has announced the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 02 Project Technical Support and Junior Research Fellow Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the Post Graduation, B.Sc can utilize this chance and apply for the BITS Recruitment 2025 . Here we mentioned the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candi...
